title: Paramount Tells Lawmakers That Netflix-WBD Merger Is “Presumptively Unlawful”
full_text: Paramount Tells Lawmakers That Netflix-WBD Merger Is “Presumptively Unlawful”. On the day that Warner Bros. Discovery’s board announced its rejection of Paramount’s latest bid, the David Ellison-led conglomerate took its argument to Capitol Hill. In a letter filed with a House Judiciary antitrust subcommittee on Wednesday, Paramount’s c…. On the day that Warner Bros.
